Valadrion.Effect:
Get challenged state when enemies are within 5m of the player for 10s, increasing combat capabilities. And reduces combat capabilities after the 10s duration for 6s.

During challenged state: 
- +(25/50)% All Damage
- +(75/150)% Attack Speed
- +(40/80)% Movement Speed
After challenged state:
- -10% All Damage
- -10% Attack Speed
- -10% Movement speed

- Balanced Body (Spear & Shield, Spear, Necklace)
- Presence of Mind (<:aLightArmor:1178349885838340167>, Crossbow, Bow, Ring)
